question: How can we increase the efficiency of our current image processing pipeline for high-resolution images?
true_answer: Recommendations include optimizing algorithms for parallel processing, using GPU acceleration, and implementing efficient data storage techniques.

steps.description: Research optimization techniques for image processing

plan.current_objective: Increase efficiency of image processing pipeline

memory_state.shared_knowledge: Algorithm parallelization and GPU acceleration are beneficial for high-resolution images. Efficient data handling critical for performance.
